attributes.action: Ignore the petition that reads "We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to Abolish concessionary travel for the over 60s"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The petition titled "We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to Abolish concessionary travel for the over 60s." is quite clearly created out of the politics of envy. There is no reason to take away public transport concessions from seniors- the argument that it's 'too expensive' is spurious; making transport affordable to those who truly need it is hardly a waste of money.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
